title: Data Science Tools Overview
subtitle: Exploring the latest tools in Data Science

blocks.title: Overview
paragraphs: The field of data science continues to grow, and new tools are constantly emerging to facilitate data analysis and machine learning.
In this article, we'll explore some of the latest and most promising data science tools, including Jupyter Notebooks, TensorFlow, and PyTorch.

blocks.code:
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
# Data analysis with pandas and numpy
